INSERT INTO order_tbl ( ord_code, mbsp_id, ord_name, ord_tel, ord_addr_zipcode, ord_addr_basic, ord_addr_detail, ord_price, ord_desc ) VALUES ( #{ord_code}, #{mbsp_id}, #{ord_name}, #{ord_tel}, #{ord_addr_zipcode}, #{ord_addr_basic}, #{ord_addr_detail}, #{ord_price}, #{ord_desc} )

INSERT INTO ordetail_tbl ( ord_code, pro_num, dt_amount, dt_price ) SELECT #{ord_code}, p.pro_num, c.cart_amount, p.pro_price FROM cart_tbl c INNER JOIN product_tbl p ON c.pro_num = p.pro_num WHERE c.mbsp_id = #{mbsp_id}
